name: Macabre Mysteries: Curse of the Nightingale Collector's Edition
name_original: Macabre Mysteries: Curse of the Nightingale Collector's Edition
description:
Macabre Mysteries: Curse of the Nightingale Collector's Edition is a game developed by Big Fish Games. It came out on 21-06-2012. It was published by Big Fish Games.
Macabre Mysteries: Curse of the Nightingale Collector's Edition is available on iOS.
